snippet: Pope Benedict XVI urged bishops to beef up their teaching about the evils of premarital sex and cohabitation, and denouncing what he called the “powerful” gay marriage lobby in America.
abstract: Pope Benedict XVI urges visiting American bishops to beef up their teaching about the evils of premarital sex and cohabitation, and denounces what he calls the 'powerful' gay marriage lobby in America.
lead_paragraph: Pope Benedict XVI urged bishops to beef up their teaching about the evils of premarital sex and cohabitation, and denouncing what he called the “powerful” gay marriage lobby in America.

headline.main: Vatican: Pope Presses U.S. Bishops on Message on Sex
headline.print_headline: Vatican: Pope Presses U.S. Bishops on Message on Sex
